info.mtgdb.api

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.mtgdb.api.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single Magic card.
    Since:
    2014-03-20
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Joseph Rios

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card()
        Creates new Card object with default values.

      • Card

        public Card(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Construct Card from JSON text. If the JSON doesn't describe a Card, the only indication would likely be all of the data members of the new Card containing default values.
        Parameters:
        json - A JSONObject that hopefully describes a Card.
